medium: Australian grasstree, mulga, paua shell, crayfish feelers, copper, metallic thread
title: Starfish Vessel
marks:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

see Sign on bottom, in black: [Starfish / Vessel / Graeme P
description: vessel form with round flat foot; outward-flaring sides coming to two vertical points on either side--rather flattened on other two sides; textured top surface; round opening at top; two arcs cut out of body on each side; three abalone inlays on body; two curving vertical elements of wood and thorny plant material attached to each side of body with metallic multicolored cords and bone (?) pegs
creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
